<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>port</title>
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="./Asset/css/bootstrap.min.css"/>
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="style.css">
</head> 
<body>
    <header class="bg-dark text-white text-center py-5">
        <h1 class="display-3"> Vishz Portfolio</h1>
        <p class="lead">Fullstack developer|React.js|MySQL</p>
    </header>
    <section class="container py-5 d-flex justify-content-center align-items-center">
        <div class="row">
            <div class="col-md-4">
                <img src="https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcSLupdWpbKkEH4Ugx62ca2xdvsrNjbp2OeX5A&s" alt="Profile Picture" class="img-fluid rounded-circle">
            </div>
            <div class="col-md-8">
                <h2>About Me</h2>
                <p>Hello! I'm Vishz, a passionate Fullstack Developer with expertise in React.js and MySQL. I love creating dynamic and responsive web applications.</p>
            </div>
        </div>
    </section>
    <section class="container py-5">

        <h2 class="text-center">skills</h2>
        <div class="row">
            <div class="col-md-4">
                <div class="card">
                    <div class="card-body">
                        <h4>React.js</h4>
                        <p>Frontend Library</p>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="col-md-4">
                <div class="card">
                    <div class="card-body">
                        <h4>Node.js</h4>
                        <p>Backend Library</p>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="col-md-4">
                <div class="card">
                    <div class="card-body">
                        <h4>MySQL</h4>
                        <p>Database</p>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>

    </section>
    <section class="container py5">
        <h2 class="text-center">Projects</h2>
        <div class="row">
            <div class="col-md-4">
                <div class="card">
                    <img src="https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcThxI98SRnNpq4BMYoD7dfJmoMXhwr-fgUZ0g&s" alt="Project 1" class="card-img-top">
                    <div class="card-body">
                        <h5>Project 1</h5>
                        <p>Machine learning</p>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="col-md-4">
                <div class="card">
                    <img src="data:image/png;base64," alt="Project 2" class="card-img-top">
                    <div class="card-body">
                        <h5>React Js</h5>
                        <p>Project Description</p>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="col-md-4">
                <div class="card">
                    <img src="https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcSncP7Qf4gEascZFXx80x5nA1ZhCovnLFEiEw&s" alt="Project 3" class="card-img-top">
                    <div class="card-body">
                        <h5>Project 3</h5>
                        <p>web development</p>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>

    </section>
    <section class="contact-section py-5">
        <div class="container">
            <h2 class="text-center mb-4">Contact</h2>
            <div class="row justify-content-center">
                <div class="col-md-6">
                    <form action="" class="p-4 shadow rounded bg-white">
                        <div class="mb-3">
                            <label for="name" class="form-label">Name</label>
                            <input type="text" id="name" class="form-control" placeholder="Enter your name">
                        </div>
                        <div class="mb-3">
                            <label for="email" class="form-label">Email</label>
                            <input type="email" id="email" class="form-control" placeholder="Enter your email">
                        </div>
                        <div class="mb-3">
                            <label for="message" class="form-label">Message</label>
                            <textarea id="message" class="form-control" rows="4" placeholder="Your message"></textarea>
                        </div>
                        <button class="btn btn-primary w-100">Send</button>
                    </form>
                </div>
              
            </div>
        </div>
    </section>
    
    <style>
        .card-img-top {
            height: 200px;
            object-fit: cover;
        }
        .contact-section {
            background: #f8f9fa;
        }
        .form-control {
            border-radius: 8px;
        }
        .btn-primary {
            border-radius: 8px;
            font-weight: bold;
        }
        .shadow {
            box-shadow: 0 4px 10px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
        }
    </style>
    
    <script src="./Asset/js/bootstrap.min.js"></script>
    <script src="./Asset/js/jquery.min.js"></script>
    <script src="./Asset/js/bootstrap.min.js"></script>
</body>
</html>
